responses: Hi there, what can I do for you?
Hi there, how can I help?
See you later, thanks for visiting
The faculties are Prof. Ben Jones, Prof. Varun Shankar, Prof. Nabil Makarem, Prof. Dav de St. Germain and Prof. Matthew Flatt
We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal

patterns: How many class do we take?
responses: There are 10 classes requested. 1st Fall semester: CS6010 Introduction to Software Development, CS6011 Computer Programming, CS6012 Data Structures and Algorithms. Spring semester: CS6013 Software Engineering, CS6014 Computer Arch + Operating Systems, CS6015 Computer Networks + Security. Summer semester: CS6016 Database Systems and Applications, CS6017 Data Analytics and Visualization. 2nd Fall semester: CS6018 Application System Design, MSD Capstone
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
